title: 241. Q&AF: Managing Finances, Reconstructing Culture & Bouncing Back From Bad Decisions
itunes:title: 241. Q&AF: Managing Finances, Reconstructing Culture & Bouncing Back From Bad Decisions
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to manage your finances at the start of your journey, how to reconstruct the culture inside a company as an intrapreneur, and how to bounce back from a bad business decision.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to manage your finances at the start of your journey, how to reconstruct the culture inside a company as an intrapreneur, and how to bounce back from a bad business decision.
